column4: Hello, I am having some install issues.  I just installed 9.10 witht the alternate cd, when I boot, I only see shell login, and read only.
i faced the issue - check for your grub menu does it say noasci etc  remove all that
most probably u run an old comp and u used text based installation with noapi etc options , just edit all that and try !
when I try to load grub menu, I get mountall main process terminated with status 1 General error mounting file systems A maintenance shell will now be started
from where are you trying this ?
i mean do u use the same system or different one ? what i said is that u reboot - go to grub and edit the parameters see if u have options like noapi etc on
just type in startx and see what comes first
oh, I'm on another system for irc
I can't do anything, it's flahsing and I can't input
even before grub ? then I think something problem with hardware ?
I had 8.04 working just fine previously
is there any other OS in it ?
